name: smartliving-iot-dashboard
description: IoT Dashboard for Smart Home with Azure services and Microsoft SQL

scripts.build: npm run build:functions && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.test: npm run test:functions && npm run test:dashboard
scripts.deploy:infrastructure: cd src/infrastructure && az deployment group create --resource-group smartliving-rg --template-file main.bicep
scripts.deploy:functions: cd src/azure-functions && func azure functionapp publish smartliving-functions
scripts.deploy:dashboard: cd src/dashboard && npm run build && az storage blob upload-batch -d '$web' -s build --account-name smartlivingweb
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:functions && npm run deploy:dashboard
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix src/azure-functions && npm install --prefix src/dashboard && npm install --prefix src/device-simulator

author: Dominicksam
